We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains what we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

What we collect

  • Contact details (name, email, phone)
  • Order and delivery information
  • Device and usage data (cookies, analytics)

How we use your data

We process your data to fulfil orders, provide support, improve our services, and for security and compliance.

Your rights

You can request access, correction, deletion, or restriction of your personal data. Contact our support team to exercise your rights.
